message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob. Your turn!
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small chunk
You're taking a big chunk, Bob. I'm offering you a bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm not budging much
I'm still willing to compromise, Bob. Take a bigger share, but I need a bit more for myself.
I'm getting greedy, Alice. You're getting a tiny piece of the pie
I'm running out of time, Bob. I need a better deal, or I'll be left with almost nothing.
I'm getting closer to the end, Alice. You're getting almost nothing
This is my last chance, Bob. Take the majority, and I'll be left with something. Please, don't leave me with nothing.
